room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Paradise" by Escape Zone Long Island in New York
room_address: 872 Middle Country Rd. Saint James, NY 11780
room_description:
Things have been going well for you, especially since you have been living on a Tropical Island and enjoying life after retirement the last few months. You decide to go on a fun treasure expedition with a few other tourists and locals to do something different for the day. While exploring the caves near Volcano bay, your crew gets notified that a major storm is coming and that the Island will be evacuated.
You've missed evacuation and the door to the shelter is locked. The storm is coming in 60 minutes! Will you be able to unlock the shelter in time and brave the storm?
